bibl.title: The Census Register P. Oxy. 984: The Reverse of Pindar's Paeans.
bibl.note: viii-150 pp. et 14 pll. + 2 dépl. sous pochette. 1.100 fr. b.

Edition of P. Oxy. VI, 984 A (Census Register. Lykopolis or Ptolemais, A.D. 91/92). The verso contains the Paeans of Pindar: P. Oxy. V, 841 (= Pack2 1361). - Preface (RSB). - 1. Introduction: The physical arrangement of the two texts (ICR). - 2. The recto and Pindar's Paeans (ICR). - 3. The census list (RSB). - 4. Text and notes (RSB). - 5. Households (RSB). - 6. Demographic analysis (BWF). - 7. The personal names (RSB). - Appendix: P. Bon. 34 (RSB). Indexes (RSB). - P. 113: Addendum to: Roger S. BAGNALL and Bruce W. FRIER, The Demography of Roman Egypt (Cambridge, 1994).
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Oxy. VI, 984 descr. 145. 4 P. Bon. I, 34
BAGNALL Roger S., Bruce W. FRIER and Ian C. RUTHERFORD, The Census Register P. Oxy. 984: The Reverse of Pindar's Paeans. (Papyrologica Bruxellensia. 29.)
Bruxelles, Fondation Égyptologique Reine Élisabeth, 1997, 8°, viii-150 pp. et 14 pll. + 2 dépl. sous pochette. 1.100 fr. b.

Edition of P. Oxy. VI, 984 A (Census Register. Lykopolis or Ptolemais, A.D. 91/92). The verso contains the Paeans of Pindar: P. Oxy. V, 841 (= Pack2 1361). - Preface (RSB). - 1. Introduction: The physical arrangement of the two texts (ICR). - 2. The recto and Pindar's Paeans (ICR). - 3. The census list (RSB). - 4. Text and notes (RSB). - 5. Households (RSB). - 6. Demographic analysis (BWF). - 7. The personal names (RSB). - Appendix: P. Bon. 34 (RSB). Indexes (RSB). - P. 113: Addendum to: Roger S. BAGNALL and Bruce W. FRIER, The Demography of Roman Egypt (Cambridge, 1994).

C.R. par Geneviève Husson, REG 111 (1998) pp. 761-762. - Orsolina Montevecchi, Aegyptus 77 (1997) pp. 153-155. - Maryline Parca, AntCl 68 (1999) pp. 502-504. - Jan Prostko-Prostynski, JJurP 29 (1999) pp. 256-257. - Walter Scheidel, BASP 38 (2001) pp. 147-151.
